context: Hello! How are you? I'm interested in seeing an old-fashioned cheesy road flick. Something similar to The Cannonball Run (1981)
While that one is great, we saw it recently so I'd like to see something a little different.
Ooh there's one on the tip of my tongue. Give me a minute It's a Mad, Mad, Mad World (1987)

Okay, no problem. I'll mention one more that we like: Smokey and the Bandit (1977) . Oh, yeah! It's a Mad, Mad, Mad World (1987) . I remember I liked it, but I remember so little about it. Just the name. That sounds like a good one to see.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a movie or TV show genre?

I love chilling, terrifying and suspenseful horror movies, intriguing and suspenseful mysteries, and thrilling thrillers with gripping suspense. I'm always up for discovering new movies in these genres! What do you recommend?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to discover new movies and get some thrilling recommendations! I can't wait to see what the recommender suggests.

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Psycho" (1960). It's a classic suspenseful horror movie with chilling and terrifying elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
Wow, "Psycho" (1960) sounds intriguing! Can you tell me more about the plot and the level of suspense in the movie?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Psycho" (1960) and see if it covers all the chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful horror elements I love. I hope the mystery and thrilling suspense are also strong in this movie. The recommender seems knowledgeable about classic movies, so I'm looking forward to hearing more about it.

context.content: "Psycho" (1960) is a psychological thriller directed by Alfred Hitchcock. The plot revolves around a secretary who embezzles money and ends up at a secluded motel run by a disturbed proprietor. The level of suspense in the movie is incredibly high, with unexpected twists and a chilling atmosphere that will keep you guessing until the very end.
That sounds exactly like the kind of movie I'm looking for! I'm definitely going to watch "Psycho" (1960). Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited about "Psycho" (1960) because it sounds like a chilling and suspenseful horror movie with a thrilling plot. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a classic that seems to fit perfectly. I can't wait to watch it!
